summary: U.S. President and Russian leader have agreed to meet next week in an undisclosed location in Budapest. This meeting aims to address ongoing issues between the two countries. Details regarding the agenda and participants are not yet available.

title: US Senate vote to end government shutdown fails for 10th time
summary: A second vote on Pentagon funding has failed, halting the process necessary to initiate military operations. This setback complicates the approval of defense spending. Lawmakers must now confront the challenges posed by the stalled funding efforts.
